name: Dice Climbers
description:
A platformer where each time you jump, you'll randomly land on a different face with a different jump style. Master all 6 sides to climb as high as you can!

Controls:

[A] : Move left, [D] Move right, [Space] jump

Tip: Gain extra points by landing on platforms that match your color!

Let us know your highscore in the comments below! (Your score is displayed in the bottom left)
